review: Horribly made.Cutscenes didn't work, subtitles didn't work, it lagged like a ♥♥♥♥♥, camera angles took up to 7 seconds to change perspective, clues didn't work and the controls were just so bad.It's a shame really because I seriously dig the artstyle of this game.
